thought: To craft light_blue_wool, I first need to craft blue_dye and light_blue_dye. To craft blue_dye, I need to craft cornflower, which is available in slot 31. I will move it to slot 1, which is in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1
